description: External alterations to include installation of two new windows to replace the existing window at first floor level to the rear elevation; installation of French doors to replace the existing windows to the rear of living room and installation of a new window opening to the rear of kitchen/dining room at ground floor level; removal of cw tank and installation of 6no solar heat panels above the roof of single storey back addition; alterations to rear garden area to form new storage and seating area; internal alterations at first floor level to include installation of a new wardrobe to front master bedroom, sub-division of the rear bedroom 2 to allow the installation of an en-suite shower room; internal alterations at ground floor level to include installation of new storage cupboards with door openings and installation of an en-suite wc and basin units to the front study/bedroom 3, new door to living room, removal of the kitchen door to form an open plan living/kitchen room, removal of the ground floor bathroom and installation of new kitchen units with new cylinder and boiler, alterations to the internal chimney areas at ground floor level; associated internal and external alterations.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
